title: How to improve my really bad handwriting in one month - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s okay if you have bad handwriting. Bad and messy handwriting is a sign of high intelligence 😉 Don’t use cursive handwriting in the initial stage itself because, if you have moderate/bad handwriting, cursive might look shabby.Take a book and write 9–10 paragraphs every day.Try to write the letters with a small gap it makes your text look neat. The gap between words is also important. Something like this If you get better with your writing, invest in a good cursive writing book, and start practicing.Be patient comfortably hold your pen and practice. Do this for one month. You’ll get to see some change.Hope it helps!

Usually, it takes about 3 months for our handwriting to change if we practice writing everyday. If you wish to change it in one month, then the only way out would be to write for a few hours daily in any book on handwriting practice. Please remember, our handwriting is a reflection of what we are. When our handwriting changes, changes will be noticed in our nature too. Similarly, even after a lot of practice, we may end up forming certain letters the way we always do. You may not be able to decipher that unless you check the formation closely. Hope, this answer helps…
